form.name: Personal Data Correction Request Form
form.description: Request correction of your personal data in compliance with data protection regulations.

fields.name: field_1_1
fields.label: Important Notes
fields.description:
Important Notes:

  1. Please complete the Data Correction Request Form and ensure that your personal data provided herein is genuine and accurate.
  2. Your request may not be processed if the information/document provided is incomplete.
  3. Third Party Requestor is to be present at the branch / office to submit this form and for verification of information and documents required.
  4. The supporting document(s) required in this form must be provided. We will respond within 21 days of receipt of the completed form with accompanying documents.
  5. If you have any queries / need any guidance in filling-up this form, you may contact our

Customer Service Department at the contact details below:

Head, Customer Service Department, Bank Muamalat Malaysia Berhad

Address : 19th Floor, Menara Bumiputra, Jalan Melaka, 51000 Kuala Lumpur

Telephone : 1-300-88-8787 (Local), +603-26005500 (International)

Email : feedback@muamalat.com.my

fields.name: field_2_1
fields.label: I am a customer / former customer and I would like to correct my personal data

fields.name: field_2_2
fields.label: I am a Third Party Requestor
fields.help_text: i.e I am making this personal data correction request for another person.

sections.title: Particulars of the Data Subject (Account Holder)
sections.description: Particulars of the Data Subject (Account Holder)

sections.title: Particulars of the Third Party Requestor
sections.description: Particulars of the Third Party Requestor

fields.name: field_3_8
fields.label: is a minor and I am the parent/legal guardian/parental responsibility over the Data Subject (account holder)
fields.description: I am making this request for the correction of personal data of Data Subject (account holder) because Data Subject (account holder)

fields.name: field_3_9
fields.label: is incapable of managing his/her affairs and I have been appointed by Court to manage his/her affairs

fields.name: field_3_10
fields.label: had passed away and I have been appointed as administrator of Data Subject's (account holder) estate

fields.name: field_3_11
fields.label: authorised me in writing to make this data correction request

fields.name: field_3_13
fields.label: copy of my NRIC/MyKid/Birth certificate for minor account, Passport (original to be produced for inspection); and
fields.description: In proof of my capacity, I enclose the following:

fields.name: field_3_14
fields.label: original of Court Order/Power of Attorney

fields.name: field_3_15
fields.label: original of authorisation letter from Data Subject (account holder)

options.all: Please update ALL of the Data Subject's (account holder) account(s) maintained with your branch
options.specific: Please update ONLY the Data Subject's (account holder) account(s) maintained with your branch as stated below:

fields.name: field_4_6
fields.label: Effective Date
fields.description: Please update the following information with effect from:

fields.name: field_4_33
fields.label: Others (Please specify)
fields.placeholder: Specify other personal data to be corrected

fields.name: field_5_2
fields.label: NRIC/Passport No.
fields.description: hereby certify that the information given in this form and all documents enclosed are true and accurate. I understand that it will be necessary for the Bank to verify my identity, and the Bank may contact me for more detailed information in order to locate the personal data requested.
